attributes.action: Phase out regular lightbulbs in homes to reduce CO2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
CLIMATE CHANGE- TAKE RESPONSIBILITY- DO SOMETHING NOW!

If changes were made globally to switch to more efficient lighting systems would cut carbon dioxide emissions by up to 10%.

Infact to put things into perspective on how BIG an issue 'lighting the world' is up to 20% of the electricity produced in the world today is just for lighting!

This petition is asking the government to take the first step towards change and do something NOW!

We ask that a date is set for the phasing out of the regular lightbulb in all homes. We feel that extra taxes added to regular bulbs to encourage people to buy energy efficient bulbs would be 'too little too late'....we need the government to be bold and brave and take the initiative- you'll be doing everyone a big favour and someones got to do it FIRST!

SIGN OUR PEACEFUL PETITION TO 'BAN THE BULB'
